Tool.Label: Select
Tool.Description: Select features by drawing a box on the map

Tool.Label: Clear Selection
Tool.Description: Clear the selected features from the currently selected layer

Tool.Label: Refresh
Tool.Description: Refresh the currently selected layer

Tool.Description: Zoom to the currently selected layer

Tool.Description: View information about the selected layer's data source

Tool.Description: Refresh the currently selected layer

Tool.Description: Zoom to the currently selected layer

Tool.Label: Service Details
Tool.Description: View information about the selected layer's data source

Tool.Label: Select All
Tool.Description: Select all the features in the currently selected layer

Tool.Label: Zoom to Selection
Tool.Description: Zoom to the currently selected features

Tool.Label: Export Selection
Tool.Description: Export the attributes of selected features to a CSV file

Tool.Label: Clear Selection
Tool.Description: Clear the selected features from the currently selected layer

Tool.Label: Filter by Map Extent
Tool.Description: Only show records for the features within the current map extent

Tool.Label: Show All
Tool.Description: Show records for all features in the current layer

Tool.Label: Show Selected
Tool.Description: Show records for selected features in the current layer

Tool.Label: Show Unselected
Tool.Description: Show records for unselected features in the current layer

Tool.Label: Get Related Records
Tool.Description: Retrieve the related records for a feature

Tool.Label: Delete Feature
Tool.Description: Remove the feature from the layer

Tool.Label: Edit Shape
Tool.Description: Modify the feature's geometry

Tool.Label: Edit Values
Tool.Description: Modify the feature's attribute values

Tool.Label: Add Attachment
Tool.Description: Add an attachment to the feature
